newsitem.title: UK: Leith wins UK Ariel award for radio advert.
newsitem.headline: Leith wins UK Ariel award for radio advert.

text.p: Leith Agency was the winner in the Ariel Awards for best radio advertising, taking ts advert for a Edinburgh group oof optical stores, the Radio Advertising Bureau (RAB) said on Wednesday.
Leith, based in Edinburgh, took the Gold award for the best radio ad after winning the award for the retail/finance category, RAB, the award sponsor, said.
